get.description: Returns a test by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a test by its ID.

put.description: Updates a test by its ID.

get.description: Retorna um question específico com base no ID fornecido.

delete.description: Exclui um question específico com base no ID fornecido.

put.description: Atualiza um question específico com base no ID fornecido.

get.summary: Get results of a specific test
get.description: Returns the results of a specific test based on the provided test ID.

put.summary: Update result of a specific test
put.description: Updates the result of a specific test based on the provided test ID.

get.description: Returns a specific result based on the provided result ID.

delete.description: Deletes a specific result based on the provided result ID.

put.description: Updates a specific result based on the provided result ID.
